This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=BRISSKIT-ANNOUNCE.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-27T13:19:20Z Tedds, Jonathan A. (Dr.) 2015-02-27T13:19:18+00:00 2015-02-27T13:19:18+00:00 Exciting Research Position in Health And Research Data Informatics using BRISSKit closes 9 March! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BRISSKIT-ANNOUNCE;cf34a2a1.1502 JOB CLOSES Mon 9th March - PLEASE CIRCULATE!<br><br>Hi everyone,<br><br>Please see below for an exciting opportunity for an experienced researcher with biomedical / health background to work with the Health And Research Data Informatics crew including BRISSKit at Leicester. Enquiries to me - the deadline is Mon 9th March.<br><br>http://ig5.i-grasp.com/fe/tpl_UniversityOfLeicester01.asp?s=4A515F4E5A565B1A&jobid=90741,2265498658&key=98175841&c=981523024502&pagestamp=sehxdsdfdfjsfliugq<br><br>Thanks,<br><br>Jonathan<br><br>Dr Jonathan A. Tedds<br>Senior Research Fellow<http://uk.linkedin.com/pub/jonathan-tedds/16/79b/769><br>Health And Research Data Informatics (HARDi) @jtedds<http://twitter.com/jtedds><br>PI #BRISSKit<http://brisskit.le.ac.uk/> Biomedical Research Software as a Service<br>Editor-in-Chief, Open Health Data<http://openhealthdata.metajnl.com/> Journal<br>Co-Chair Research Data Alliance \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd WDS Publishing Data<http://rd-alliance.org/internal-groups/rdawds-publishing-data-ig.html> Interest Group<br>Department of Health Sciences<http://www2.le.ac.uk/departments/health-sciences><br>College of Medicine, Biological Sciences and [...] Tedds, Jonathan A. (Dr.) 2015-02-19T13:04:38+00:00 2015-02-19T13:04:38+00:00 FW: Final Agenda for BRISSKit Event and Hack, 23-24th Feb 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BRISSKIT-ANNOUNCE;f8e6427f.1502 Hi everyone - slightly modified agenda in attached and on meeting page http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/all/modules/civicrm/extern/url.php?u=115&qid=269. I've emailed it round again as you don't want to miss the overview demo from Saj at 10.20am before coffee on Monday rather than after, as previously!<br><br>Looking forward to seeing everyone :)<br><br>Jonathan Tedds, Jonathan A. (Dr.) 2015-02-18T14:15:14+00:00 2015-02-18T14:15:14+00:00 Final Agenda for BRISSKit Event and Hack, 23-24th Feb 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BRISSKIT-ANNOUNCE;b7c32210.1502 Dear all,<br><br>Thanks to those of you who have signed up to the BRISSKit community event and hack next week! The BRISSKit team is looking forward to meeting you all at the event. Please find an outline agenda for the meeting attached and see updated meeting page http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/all/modules/civicrm/extern/url.php?u=115&qid=269 .<br><br>You'll notice we've left plenty of time for raising ideas from you all as well as telling you about some of the exciting work in this area already happening and of course assisting you in trying out i2b2 in particular. [...] Tedds, Jonathan A. (Dr.) 2015-02-05T15:16:01+00:00 2015-02-05T15:16:01+00:00 Last places! BRISSKit Biomedical Research Software Event - Feb 23-24th 2015, Leicester https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BRISSKIT-ANNOUNCE;668259ad.1502 Dear all,<br><br>A reminder that places are still available to join a free BRISSKit biomedical and health research software community event and hack on Feb 23-24th at College Court conference centre in Leicester \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd details and sign up links below. Let us know if you have an interesting idea or research project you\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdd like to present or demo at the event as we have a couple of slots left. A final agenda will be circulated shortly. I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdm pleased to announce that Paul Burton, Professor of Infrastructural Epidemiology<br>and Head of Data Science and Co-PI of the ALSPAC Project at the [...] Tedds, Jonathan A. (Dr.) 2014-12-22T13:00:50+00:00 2014-12-22T13:00:50+00:00 BRISSKit Biomedical Research Software News - Dec 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BRISSKIT-ANNOUNCE;e5f5ef4f.1412 Integrating<br>Research<br>Data<br><br>[http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/default/files/civicrm/persist/contribute/images/BRisskitlogo.jpg]<br><br>[http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/default/files/civicrm/persist/contribute/images/Jisc-new-logo-2013.png]<br><br>[http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/default/files/civicrm/persist/contribute/images/leicester-uni-050.png]<br><br>Join the conversation here<http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/all/modules/civicrm/extern/url.php?u=110&qid=269><br><br>Dear all,<br><br>The BRISSKit project<http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/all/modules/civicrm/extern/url.php?u=111&qid=269> is now entering a new and exciting phase. BRISSKit is open source Biomedical Research Software as a Service and is a strategic project for Jisc<http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/all/modules/civicrm/extern/url.php?u=112&qid=269> in the UK, who intend to provide further funding to transition the project into a service during 2015-16. It complements the groundbreaking developments Jisc has recently brokered to enable the secure movement and hosting of sensitive datasets for research use via the Janet academic network and Shared Data Centre<http://www.brisskit.le.ac.uk/sites/all/modules/civicrm/extern/url.php?u=113&qid=269>. BRISSKit offers the ability to upload, manage, combine and collaborate with [...]
